AT.name: Super Mario Advance™
AT.description: Als Super Mario Advance kommt das legendäre Spiel zur Markteinführung des Game Boy Advance jetzt als Doppelpack zurück. Super Mario Bros. 2 kommt als erweiterte Version, exklusiv für den GBA, mit neuen Features, die in der Originalversion nicht vorhanden waren, besserer Grafik und verbessertem Sound. Spiele als Mario, Luigi, Toad oder Peach und bahne deinen Weg aus dem geheimnisvollen Land Subcon. Auch der Klassiker Mario Bros. kommt aufgeputzt daher: Marios und Luigis erster gemeinsamer Auftritt, mit tempogeladenem Platforming, während du die verschiedenen Levels von den Kreaturen bereinigst, die in den Röhren hausen.

AU.name: Super Mario Advance™
AU.description: A popular launch title for the Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance features two classic Mario games in one. Super Mario Bros. 2 returns with an enhanced version unique to GBA, with new features not present in the original, and improved graphics and sound. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad or Peach, and escape the mysterious land of Subcon. Also in spruced-up form is arcade classic Mario Bros.: Mario and Luigi’s first appearance together, featuring fast-paced platforming as you rid the levels of pipe-dwelling critters.

BG.name: Super Mario Advance™
BG.description: A popular launch title for the Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance features two classic Mario games in one. Super Mario Bros. 2 returns with an enhanced version unique to GBA, with new features not present in the original, and improved graphics and sound. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad or Peach, and escape the mysterious land of Subcon. Also in spruced-up form is arcade classic Mario Bros.: Mario and Luigi’s first appearance together, featuring fast-paced platforming as you rid the levels of pipe-dwelling critters.

BE.name: Super Mario Advance™
BE.description: Un jeu populaire au lancement de la Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance comporte deux jeux Mario classiques en un. Super Mario Bros. 2 est de retour avec une version optimisée exclusive à la GBA ; il comprend de nouvelles fonctionnalités ainsi que de nouveaux graphismes et un son améliorés. Jouez avec Mario, Luigi, Toad ou Peach et fuyez le monde mystérieux de Subcon. Sans oublier une version mise à neuf du classique Mario Bros. : la première apparition de Mario et Luigi ensemble, un jeu de plateforme au rythme palpitant dans lequel, vous devez vous débarrasser de créatures qui vivent dans les tuyaux au fur et à mesure des niveaux que vous débloquez.

ES.name: Super Mario Advance™
ES.description: El popular título de lanzamiento para Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance, incluye dos juegos clásicos de Mario en uno. Super Mario Bros. 2 regresa con una versión mejorada, solo para GBA, con nuevas características que no estaban presentes en el original, además de gráficos y sonido mejorados. Ponte en la piel de Mario, Luigi, Toad o Peach y escapa de la tierra misteriosa de Subcon. Asimismo, se incluye una versión renovada del clásico juego de arcade Mario Bros.: la primera aparición de Mario y Luigi juntos en un trepidante juego de plataformas en el que debes deshacerte de las criaturas que viven en las tuberías a lo largo de los diferentes niveles.

IT.name: Super Mario Advance™
IT.description: Uno dei primi e più popolari titoli per Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance, include due giochi intramontabili di Mario in uno. Super Mario Bros. 2 ritorna con una versione unica e migliorata per GBA, insieme a nuove caratteristiche non presenti nell'originale, oltre a grafica e suoni migliori. Gioca nei panni di Mario, Luigi, Toad e Peach e fuggi dalla terra misteriosa di Subcon. Ma non è finita! In più, una versione ritoccata del titolo arcade senza tempo Mario Bros.: Mario & Luigi, il primo titolo in cui i due fratelli appaiono insieme, che include un platforming frenetico mentre ripulisci i livelli dalle bestioline che dimorano nei tubi.

NL.name: Super Mario Advance™
NL.description: In tandem uitgebracht met de Game Boy Advance. Super Mario Advance bevat twee klassieke Mario spellen in een. Super Mario Bros. 2 keert terug met een verbeterde versie die uniek is voor GBA, met nieuwe functies die niet in het origineel te vinden zijn, evenals verbeterde graphics en geluidseffecten. Speel als Mario, Luigi, Toad, of Peach, en ontsnap uit het mysterieuze land van Subcon. De arcadeklassieker Mario Bros., het eerste gezamenlijke avontuur van Mario en Luigi, keert ook in verbeterde vorm terug, met razendsnelle platform-actie waarbij je de levels ontdoet van wezens die in buizen huizen.

NZ.name: Super Mario Advance™
NZ.description: A popular launch title for the Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance features two classic Mario games in one. Super Mario Bros. 2 returns with an enhanced version unique to GBA, with new features not present in the original, and improved graphics and sound. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad or Peach, and escape the mysterious land of Subcon. Also in spruced-up form is arcade classic Mario Bros.: Mario and Luigi’s first appearance together, featuring fast-paced platforming as you rid the levels of pipe-dwelling critters.

PL.name: Super Mario Advance™
PL.description: A popular launch title for the Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance features two classic Mario games in one. Super Mario Bros. 2 returns with an enhanced version unique to GBA, with new features not present in the original, and improved graphics and sound. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad or Peach, and escape the mysterious land of Subcon. Also in spruced-up form is arcade classic Mario Bros.: Mario and Luigi’s first appearance together, featuring fast-paced platforming as you rid the levels of pipe-dwelling critters.

PT.name: Super Mario Advance™
PT.description: O popular título de lançamento para a Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance, inclui dois clássicos do Mario num só. Super Mario Bros. 2 regressa com uma versão melhorada, apenas para a GBA, com novas funcionalidades que não existiam no original e gráficos e som aprimorados. Joga como Mario, Luigi, Toad ou Peach e foge da ilha misteriosa de Subcon. O clássico Mario Bros. também está todo renovado: a primeira aparição de Mario e Luigi juntos, num jogo de plataformas frenético, em que em todos os níveis tens de eliminar as criaturas que habitam os canos.

RU.name: Super Mario Advance™
RU.description: Известная как первая игра для системы Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance вмещает в себе две классических Марио игры. Super Mario Bros. 2 возвращается в уникальной, улучшенной версии для системы GBA, с новыми особенностями, не присутствующими в оригинальной версии, и улучшенной графикой и звуком. Сбежите с загадочной земли Subcon, играя в роли Марио, Луиджи, Тоада или Пич. Также не стоит забывать о классической аркаде Mario Bros., где Марио и Луиджи впервые встретились в одной и той же игре. Это интенсивный платформер, где вам предстоит очистить трубы от их неприветливых обитателей.
